articles.author: Rezaul H Laskar
articles.title: On EU official call against India over Russian oil, Jaishankar’s blunt response - Hindustan Times
articles.description: India, one of the biggest buyers of Russian crude, ships refined fuel produced from the crude to European states | Latest News India
articles.content: NEW DELHI: India has pushed back against a suggestion by a top European Union (EU) official for a crackdown on Russian oil resold by Indian firms as refined fuels, with external affairs minister S Ja… [+2778 chars]

articles.title: Ukraine denies Russia destroyed Patriot missile defence system - Reuters
articles.description: Ukraine denied on Wednesday that a Russian hypersonic missile had destroyed a U.S.-made Patriot missile defence system during an air strike on Kyiv.
articles.content:
KYIV, May 17 (Reuters) - Ukraine denied on Wednesday that a Russian hypersonic missile had destroyed a U.S.-made Patriot missile defence system during an air strike on Kyiv.
